title: A New LeaverBuster System
body:
So I play with some of my friends who occasionally get low priority queues (I don't know why), and I was wondering, can we have a LeaverBuster System like Titanfall where people in low priority queue are only matched against other leavers for like 5 games?  I'm not sure if it would work well, but I think its a good idea and can work better than the current system.  I'd love to hear your responses.
Edit: We could also have something like Overwatch where people who leave enough get a severe xp bonus (75% if I'm remembering correctly) this does not impact their ability to get into a game or overall matchmaking times, so this could work better with the BE (blue essence) from leveling.  Personally, I would rather it be a low priority queue where you can still find a game, but it would put another player in a game rather than you and would subside after the given time.

replies.body:
Would cause delay of games somewhere
Could also lead to the prisoners island scenario?(im to believe riot doesn't go for this)
My thoughts :D

Y'know, I wasn't actually aware that's how they handled leavers. It kind of sounds like a good idea in theory, but I'm definitely not the best guy to suggest this too. You should post this over on Gameplay to see what other players think about it!
